07.description: I involved in a large banking project called "Avalon". Developed many frontend interfaces for banking clients using ReactJS and Redux.

achievements.details: Contributed frontend expertise in the development of products through the software life cycle, from requirements definition through successful deployment.
Excelled in agile software development and management of technological issues, earning the highest customer satisfaction rating for all software solutions delivered.

07.other: Building front end code base and libraries, writing test cases and TDD, team management, monitoring junior developers, post-sale support and maintenance.

06.description: I involved in many client faced apps development for gambling industries. AngularJS, Angular, ReactJS, TypeScript are few to name the technologies used to develop the apps.

achievements.details: Introduced methodologies and best practices that enhanced product definition, release processes and customization of applications to user needs.

06.other: Building front end shared components, testing, monitoring, support and maintenance.

05.description: I worked on a project called "Intuitive Dashboards" - which is a data visualisation tool and I developed frontend (Single Page web Application) using cutting-edge technologies like JavaScript (VanillaJS, Kendo UI, BackboneJS, UnderscoreJS, RequireJS, jQuery, ReactJS), HTML5 and CSS3.

achievements.details: Facilitated customization of Intuitive Dashboards by encouraging other developers to adopt emerging standards for web app development, architecture and tools.

Participated in partners’ conference due to ability to translate user needs into easy-to-understand software solutions. Helped sales/professional delivery team close major deals generating more than £100K in revenue over years.

05.other: Decoupling front-end from back end, prototyping, UI/UX design and development, testing, database management, client management, post-sale support and maintenance.

04.description: I assisted in design and development of Patient Appointment Confirmation Service and Telephone Answering Service application for NHS Trusts.

achievements.details: Provided user requirements analysis, design and programming support for enhancement of web application accessed by roughly 25k NHS users every day.
Fuelled additional revenue stream through responsive customer support, generating £20K in new license sales within first few weeks of new product release.

04.other: Brand development, web site functionality and UI enhancement using JavaScript/HTML/CSS, application development using C# and deployment and support.

03.description: I worked on the project Customer Loyalty Solution. The former software application was targeted to small retailers. I was responsible for requirement analysis, impact analysis, application development using C# and testing, install and configuration, post-sale support and maintenance.

02.description: I worked on UI Design for developing Rich Internet Applications (m-RIA) framework and mobile applications. I was responsible for prototyping, pictographs, research on User Interface Design Process and Usability Standards.

01.description: I worked along with Network and Systems maintenance team to provide the best service, supported about 75 networked systems, phone systems in the organisation.
